snippet.title: KLOINKS! - release trailer
snippet.description:
You can download KLOINKS! from the ZDoom Forums: (I assure you, the quality of the game is leagues better than the video's editing quality.)
https://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?t=78853
To play KLOINKS! you must have an up to date version of GZDoom (4.11 is good) already installed. KLOINKS! does not require an IWAD to play (no pesky doom2.wad required to run this bad boy!)

KLOINKS! playlist: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLh4Lp52-UNccuI3p4zpsrvg47HKA1LQO4

KLOINKS! is a little total conversion for GZDoom I've been working on for the past two or so years. The visuals are all made up of 3D rendered clay-like material (that I made in Blender) and the music is also made by me. Sound effects are some old stock sound effects that I wrangled around a bit.

For a more gameplay focused video, check out this video: https://youtu.be/b8057En1l94

Please be gentle on the level design (and recorded gameplay), it's my first time doing both of them.
